TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content: When is kerbiloid?

After the ecliptic passes through the moon's fourth house, Jupiter's seventh apartment, and Mercury's eighteenth McMansion. Or possibly the other way around.

 

In two hundred words or less, how can I make everybody on the internet be nice to each other? You have ten minutes, starting... now.

Insert codings that will make everyone's post says"Nice."

Why is a motor that spins slower, than how it supposed to, is called "Burnt" while there's no fire?

Because it's tired and out of inspiration.

When the dinner?

Dinner's when it's served.

How do you breathe?

With pleasure.

How to ensure that Kerbin is real?

crash a rocken into it

how can i eat the waffle?

Ask a cat to eat it.

How can I change the microprocessor on a CARROT or Arduino board to a High-End Intel i5 or i7? And how can I equip either boards with discrete graphic cards as well?

You publish an announcement: "Have a micro on a CARROT and Arduino board. Need a High-End Intel i5 or i7."

Why not run KSP on Arduino?

because it's sad

how can i summon the kraken

Use mods. As many as you can.

Why is he attempting to lift-off from eve using a single LV-N engine?

Because he thinks Eve is another giant Chernobyl that he wanted to make it even more Chernobyl. You got what I mean?

Why is he using the rotor from the Breaking Ground DLC but still has his helicopter rotor powered by jet engines?

Because he is a traditionalist. You just didn't see his golfcar.

Why Kerbals don't surf on waves?

Because they're all being used for radios

 

Are Kerbal Kamikazes a good idea?

Especially orange ones. They are reusable.

When will they build a trampoline next to the KSC pool?

They would never built one. Kerbals supposed to end up in space.

Why did Samsung removed the headphone jack on the Note10 & Note10+?

Because it was not a headphone jack, it was a cigarette lighter. But nobody reads the instructions.

If there arre Note10 and Note10+, then where is Note10-?

Good question. It's a fake Note10, if a counterfeit would ever exist.

Why is the Samsung S10e isn't called S10-?

They had enough money to add a c part to the - 

Why does BBC Sounds Exist

Because they have not enough money for BBC Looks.

Why "goods" (thing to be sold) don't have singular form?

Because humans always buy more than one thing, even when they plan to buy only one thing

Why are Kerbals green and not purple?

Because probably the manufacturer of the mini-toys bound by HarvesteR to the bottle rockets, and later become the Keebal prototypes, got the idea from Kermit.

What if combine EmDrive with Epstein drive?

Things will go boom.

Booga?

Edited July 4, 2022 by Lo var Lachland

Bugga-Bugga.

Do electric Mechjeb's dream?

Yes. You can see this when it's docking. Fast flashes of RCS arre equivalento for fast eye motions.

If tie 10 falcons together, can they land as a whole?
